CustomField.description: URL for the logo image to display in the timeout modal
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Overrides the default logo from Custom Metadata. Supports: • Web URLs (https://) • Static Resources (/resource/Name) • Relative paths for Experience Cloud (/img/logo.png) Note: URL must be accessible to all users. For secure external URLs, ensure CORS is configured.
CustomField.label: Logo Url
